text_importexport_content: Apa mutha kulowetsa ndi kutumiza zikhomo zanu mumtundu wa Netscape.
text_help_content:
Ma Bookmark Manager ndi pulogalamu yomwe imathandizira kusunga ndikusintha ma bookmark a intaneti.

Kuti mupange bookmark yatsopano, kapena chikwatu chatsopano, dinani chizindikiro cha "kuphatikiza": sankhani pakati pa bookmark ndi foda, ikani mutu kenako URL, kenako dinani kusunga kuti musunge zosinthazo, kapena dinani kufufuta kuti muchotse chikhomo, kapena kubwerera kudumpha zosinthazo koma sungani chizindikiro.

Dinani batani "lotseguka" pafupi ndi bookmark kuti tsegulani ulalo wotsatira.

Dinani batani "add" mkati mwa chikwatu kuti muwonjezere chinthu china.

Kwa ma bookmark ndi mafoda onse, dinani batani "edit" kuti musinthe iwo, dinani batani "kubwerera" kuti musinthe malo ndi chinthu cham'mbuyomu, dinani batani "kupita patsogolo" kuti musinthe malo ndi chinthu chotsatira, kanikizani batani "kupita mmwamba" kuti musunthire fodayo kumene pakadali pano, kapena dinani batani "pita kunsi" kuti musunthire chinthucho mkati mwa chikwatu chotsatira.

M'makonzedwe azosankha, omwe mutha kupezeka mukadina pazithunzi "zosintha", mutha kubisala kapena kuwonetsa mabatani akusintha, kuyenda ndi kuwonjezera. Ndikothekanso kusintha chilankhulo chogwiritsa ntchito.

Kuti mulowetse kapena kutumiza ma bookmark, dinani pachizindikiro cholowa / kutumiza. Mtundu wa HTML Netscape Bookmarks umathandizidwa, chifukwa chake ndizotheka kuitanitsa ma bookmark omwe amatumizidwa ndi asakatuli akuluakulu. Mukamatumiza ma bookmark kuchokera mu fayilo, ma bookmark omwe alipo pakadali pano amachotsedwa ndikulembedwanso.

Ma Bookmark Manager ndi Progressive Web Application, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti zimayenda mkati mwa msakatuli. Mukayiyika, pomwe zosatsegula sizikuwonetsedwa, imayendabe mkati mwa msakatuli. Zikhomo zimasungidwa pakasungidwe kakusakatula kwamasamba a bookmark.marcoparrone.com. localStorage imagwira ntchito bwino ndi asakatuli a Chrome, Edge ndi Firefox. Masakatuli ena akhoza kuchotsa LocalStorage patapita nthawi. Android mwachisawawa imagwiritsa ntchito Chrome, Windows posintha Edge. Ma Bookmark Manager pakadali pano samathandizidwa pazinthu za Apple. Ndi cholinga chothandizira kupewa kutayika kwa ma bookmark, tikulimbikitsidwa kuti tisungire zosunga zobwezeretsera pogwiritsa ntchito "kutumiza" kwina, nthawi iliyonse mukasintha zina zomwe simukufuna kutaya.

OLEMBEDWA KAPENA OGWIRITSA MALAMULO ACHIKHALIDWE ADZAKHALIDWA POFUNA ZONSE, ZOCHITIKA KAPENA ZOCHITIKA ZINA, NGAKHALE KUCHITA KWA PANGANO, TORT KAPENA KANTHAWI KOMANSO, KUCHOKERA KU, KAPENA KAPENA KULUMIKIZANA NDI SOFTWARE KAPENA KUGWIRITSA NTCHITO KAPENA ZINTHU ZINA ZOPEREKA ZOTHANDIZA.
text_about_content2: UTUMIKI UNO UTHENGA NTHAWI ZONSE MUTHANDIZA KUMASULIRA KWAMBIRI NDI GOOGLE. GOOGLE ITSUTSA ZITSIMBIKITSO ZONSE ZOKHUDZANA NDI KUMASULIRA, KUFOTOKOZA KAPENA KUWONETSEDWA, KUPHATIKIZAPO ZITSANZO ZONSE ZA KUCHITIKA, KUKHULUPIRIKA, NDI ZINTHU ZONSE ZOTHANDIZA ZOKHUDZITSA NTCHITO, ZOKHUDZA CHOLINGA CHABWINO NDI CHINSINSI.
text_about_content3:
Pulogalamuyi yamasuliridwa kuti ikhale yosavuta kugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamu yomasulira yoyendetsedwa ndi Google Translate. Kuyesayesa koyenera kwachitika kuti kumasulira kolondola, komabe, palibe kumasulira kwadzidzidzi komwe sikungakhale koyenera kapena cholinga chake m'malo mwa omasulira anthu. Zomasulira zimaperekedwa ngati ntchito kwa ogwiritsa ntchito tsamba la marcoparrone.com, ndipo zimaperekedwa "monga momwe zilili." Palibe chitsimikizo chamtundu uliwonse, chofotokozedwa kapena chofotokozedwapo, chomwe chimapangidwa molondola, molondola, kapena molondola pamasuliridwe aliwonse ochokera ku Chingerezi kupita mchilankhulo china chilichonse. Zina (monga zithunzi, makanema, Flash, ndi zina zambiri) sizingamasuliridwe molondola chifukwa chakuchepa kwa pulogalamu yomasulira.

Malembo ovomerezeka ndi omwe Chingerezi ndi webusayiti iyi. Zolakwika zilizonse zomwe zidachitika mukutanthauzira sizikhala zomangika ndipo sizikhala ndi zotsatirapo zalamulo pakutsatira kapena kukwaniritsa. Ngati pangakhale mafunso okhudzana ndi kulondola kwa zidziwitso zomwe zili patsamba lawebusayiti, lembani mtundu wachingerezi webusayiti yomwe ili mtundu wovomerezeka.
